sources.title: Happy Go Lucky (1936) COMEDY
sources.description:
tars: Phil Regan, Evelyn Venable, Jed Prouty
 Director: Aubrey Scotto

 A singer believes her marine pilot husband has died in the Pacific, but finds a man who looks exactly like him dancing in a night club act. Realizing it is her husband, and thinking he must have amnesia, she sets out to help him recover his memory.

metadata.Plot: A singer (Venable) believes her marine pilot husband, accused of treason, has died in the Pacific. She finds a man who looks exactly like her husband dancing in a club act. Realizing it is her husband, and thinking he must have amnesia, she sets out to help him recover his memory and clear his name.
metadata.Writer: Raymond L. Schrock, Olive Cooper, Eric Taylor
metadata.Actors: Phil Regan, Evelyn Venable, Jed Prouty
